apple-cake.title: Apple Cake
pars: Bernadette had used a mini muffin tray and simply tossed them in cinnamon and sugar. Cute and yummy! I did a dozen mini muffins and cooked the rest in a loaf tin. I think it worked better as mini muffins.
ingredients: 3 or 4 cooking apples peeled, cored and roughly chopped
enough milk to make into a fairly stiff batter
method: Mix all together to form a lumpy mixture.
Place in a greased roasting pan or lamington pan and bake in a moderate oven about 1 hour - or until cooked when tested.
While hot, spread with butter and sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar. Serve hot with cream or custard for a dessert, or cold as a slice.
